title: Round the twist: Wunderpants
creator_credit: Paul Jennings, Steve Steve Jodrell, Antonia Barnard and Australian Children's Television Foundation
brief_description: When Pete dries his underpants in the microwave, special powers are conveyed with embarrassing consequences. But when Pete’s frog competes in the jumping competition, the wunderpants save the day.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Jennings, Steve Steve Jodrell, Antonia Barnard and Australian Children’s Television Foundation
description: When Pete dries his underpants in the microwave, special powers are conveyed with embarrassing consequences. But when Pete’s frog competes in the jumping competition, the wunderpants save the day.
